import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { extractAudioFiles } from './utils/utils'; export default function DrumPad() { const audioFiles = useSelector(state => state.audioFiles); function handlePadClick(event) { const elem = document.getElementById(event.target.id + 'audio'); elem.currentTime = 0; elem.play(); } function handleKeyPress(event) { console.log(event) if(event.key === "q") { const elem = document.getElementById('testAudio'); elem.currentTime = 0; elem.play(); } } return (

{audioFiles}

) }
